description.paragraph: When libfixbuf is used as a NetFlowV9 translator, this is the element to which libfixbuf maps the Cisco Element NF_F_FW_EXT_EVENT whose ID (33002) represents an enterprise element in IPFIX.
When libfixbuf is used as a NetFlowV9 translator, this is the element to which libfixbuf maps the Cisco Element NF_F_FW_EVENT whose ID (40005) represents an enterprise element in IPFIX.

When libfixbuf is used as a NetFlowV9 translator, this is the element to which libfixbuf maps arbitrary Cisco Elements whose ID is greater than 346 and are not specifically translated to another element.
